---
pagetitle: "Normal Area Between Question"
params:
  mu: 23
  sigma: 8 
  x1: 10
  x2: 25
---

```{r}
mu<-params$mu
sigma<-params$sigma
x1<-params$x1
x2<-params$x2
```

Suppose that a normal distribution has mean $`r mu`$ and standard deviation $`r sigma`$. Find the area between $`r x1`$ and $`r x2`$
